eventsDayOne.title: Morning wellness activity
eventsDayOne.caption: Start your day out with a relaxing wellness activity at the W San Francisco brought to you by Alight.
eventsDayOne.classes: bg-blue h-100 rounded py-2 px-2 d-flex flex-column

eventsDayOne.title: Breakfast & watch party
eventsDayOne.caption: Looking for a place to view the Wednesday morning Workday Rising keynote? Join Alight at the W San Francisco before you head to the Moscone Center. Breakfast and a comfortable viewing room will be provided.
eventsDayOne.classes: bg-teal h-100 rounded py-2 px-2 d-flex flex-column

eventsDayOne.title: Alight Illuminate mixer
eventsDayOne.caption: Join Alight at the W San Francisco before you head out for a night on the town! Lite bites, cocktails, and entertainment are on tap.
eventsDayOne.classes: bg-orange h-100 rounded py-2 px-2 d-flex flex-column
